info.name: RedFlagDeals.com Forums Change Visited Link Colour
info.description: Changes the link colour of visited threads to Red (by default - can be changed to user preference)
info.additionalInfo:
V1.0a Added screenshots

V1.0 Works with Firefox 13+
Thanks to all who provided generic Visited code examples. I modified it for RFD Forums.
To change the colour, edit the style and change the hex code for the color:#XXXXXX attribute
